files.title: Get Started!
files.content:
Begin writing your content here.

Select any text or start on a new line to access the AI prompt selector.

Import Inscriptor Hub to view pre-created prompt packs or import additional AI models.

Automate tasks such as grammar correction or wording improvements by setting up AI Analysis.

Create something amazing!

variables.title: WritingStyle
variables.description: Define how you want the AI to write. Specify language, tone, stylem, tense, etc. Be as precise as possible.
